title: Well aren’t Jessie J and Channing Tatum just two adorable kids in love
text:
Jessie and Channing have been dating for a year (Picture: Jessie J/Instagram)

While Jessie J and Channing Tatum kept their relationship private for quite a while, they’re all about the loved-up selfies now.

And thus, we too are all about the loved-up selfies.

After first being linked a year ago, following Channing’s split with wife Jenna Dewan, Jessie and her Magic Mike actor boyfriend took their love to the streets this week.

Documenting it for us regular punters, we were treated to a smorgasbord of cutesiepie selfies from the genetically-blessed couple.

With a tres chic black and white shot, the pair cosied up to one another in front of the Pacific Park ferris wheel in Santa Monica, California.

Just a pair of kids in love (Picture: Jessie J/Instagram)

Cute (Picture: Jessie J/Instagram)

In another photo seemingly shot by a friend or a rather inquisitive stranger, Jessie posted a sweet pic of Channing with his arm wrapped around her.

Advertisement

Advertisement

This is love.

They also got active as they found some bikes and took a merry ride along the beachside because oh they do like to be beside the seaside, they do like to be beside the sea.

Seems all is rather swell in the land of Jessie and Channing, or as we like to call them: Chassie.

They then hit the road (Picture: Jessie J / Instagram)

Their sighting comes after Channing’s ex-wife Jenna opened up on the couple’s relationship, revealing the discovery ‘blindsided’ her.

In a candid extract from her upcoming memoir Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday the actress spoke about hearing of her ex-husband’s new girl.

According to Radar Online, the 38-year-old wrote: ‘There I was, on a plane, alone, finding out about his new relationship. I felt blindsided.’

Channing was married to Jenna for nine years (Picture: LaVeris/FilmMagic)

The mother-of-one later revealed how she was going to react to the news via Twitter, but decided not to share her string of messages.

‘Instead of reacting the way I wanted… I asked myself this: How do I choose grace in this moment?’ she explained.

Yet, there is no bad blood between both Jessie and Jenna, as the step-up star recently threw her support behind the singer when fans compared the duo.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Amen Jessie!!!! Women for all the way. No need for negativity,’ she said: ‘Let’s live in a world where we support each other and raise each other up.’

The star continued: ‘Like I said before, positive vibes all the way. Nothing but respect.’

Jenna has six-year-old daughter Everly who she co-parents with Channing.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Well aren’t Jessie J and Channing Tatum just two adorable kids in love as they share loved-up selfies.
